subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Martin Maldonado’s two-run, tiebreaking home run in the ninth inning off Matt Capps pushed Milwaukee past host Minnesota. Oakland released Manny Ramirez as a free agent.
snippet: Martin Maldonado’s two-run, tiebreaking home run in the ninth inning off Matt Capps pushed Milwaukee past host Minnesota. Oakland released Manny Ramirez as a free agent.
